thread.title: Hilarious NFL ‘Bad Lip Reading’ released for 2017
thread.title_full: Hilarious NFL ‘Bad Lip Reading’ released for 2017

title: Hilarious NFL ‘Bad Lip Reading’ released for 2017
text:
Hilarious NFL ‘Bad Lip Reading’ released for 2017 Bad Lip Reading has released its long-awaited 2017 NFL episode. Slot to 247Sports Links 
Bad Lip Reading is back with another NFL edition of their hilarious dubs. 
The popular YouTube channel's creators cut up some innocuous clips from the 2016 NFL season and made them wildly entertaining by adding nonsensical voiceovers that actually look like accurate lip readings. 
Check it out in the video player below: 
The six-minute video, released on Wednesday, already has well over 100,000 views and will likely keep climbing. Bad Lip Reading split last year's NFL video into two four-minute parts; Part One tallied 15.7 million views and Part Two registered 9.6 million views . 
The Bad Lip Reading YouTube channel has nearly six million subscribers and produces great videos all by making politicians and other pop-culture icons look like they're saying incredibly ridiculous stuff. 
Needless to say, the 2017 NFL episode was long awaited — and, once again, delivered. 
Follow Kevin Boilard on Twitter: @247KevinBoilard Author
